TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAttributeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件概述](/dotnet/framework/winforms/events-overview-windows-forms)。For more information about handling events, see [Events Overview](/dotnet/framework/winforms/events-overview-windows-forms). 仅当调用 方法时，才会发生 事件。The event occurs only when you call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例从名为 UnknownAttributes 的文件中对名为 `Group` 的类进行反序列化。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. 只要在文件中找到了类中没有相应成员的元素，就会发生 事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要尝试该示例，请将以下 XML 代码粘贴到名为 UnknownAttributes 的文件中。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. ``` MyGroup ``` [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Attr As XmlAttribute
public: property System::Xml::XmlAttribute ^ Attr { System::Xml::XmlAttribute ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象表示未知的 XML 特性。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the unknown XML attribute.
An that represents the unknown XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例从名为 UnknownAttributes 的文件中对名为 `Group` 的类进行反序列化。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. 只要在文件中找到了类中没有相应成员的元素，就会发生 事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要尝试该示例，请将以下 XML 代码粘贴到名为 UnknownAttributes 的文件中。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. ``` MyGroup ``` [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExpectedAttributes As String
public: property System::String ^ ExpectedAttributes { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 XML 特性名的逗号分隔列表，该列表应出现在 XML 文档实例中。

span.span: Gets a comma-delimited list of XML attribute names expected to be in an XML document instance.

value.span: XML 特性名的逗号分隔列表。

span.span: A comma-delimited list of XML attribute names.
Each name is in the following format: :.

summary.span: 获取未知 XML 特性的行号。

value.span: 未知 XML 特性的行号。

span.span: The line number of the unknown XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例在 方法遇到未知特性时打印 方法返回的值。The following example prints the value returned by the method when the method encounters an unknown attribute. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
